meanings.definition: Cover with a layer on top
meanings.sent1: She will overlay the cake with chocolate frosting.
meanings.sent2: Please overlay the map with the new data.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally overlayed too much sauce on the pasta.
meanings.sent4: His kindness will overlay any past mistakes.
meanings.sent5: The snow will overlay the town in a blanket of white.

meanings.definition: An additional layer on top of something
meanings.sent1: The artist added an overlay of glitter to the painting.
meanings.sent2: The presentation slides have an overlay of text on each image.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer created a unique overlay of lace on the dress.
meanings.sent4: The memories of childhood provide an emotional overlay to the story.
meanings.sent5: The night sky had an overlay of twinkling stars.
